", "previous_statement_hash": "9859f34c527c32d1225e11bf2699f1ef5a82dc610bdbb89c793a9684"}, "metaFilter": {"query": "", "facets": {}, "text": []}, "explanation": "", "statement_range": {"start": {"column": 0, "row": 0}, "end": {"column": 0, "row": 0}}, "startTime": "2022-06-15T00:58:01.879Z", "data": [], "filteredColumnCount": 1, "executionTime": 3881, "fetchedOnce": false, "hasResultset": true, "endTime": "2022-06-15T00:58:05.760Z"}, "errors": [], "chartMapHeat": null, "statement_raw": "-- JSON
-- https://github.com/rcongiu/Hive-JSON-Serde
DROP TABLE test_json;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test_json (
    one boolean,
    three array<string>,
    two double,
    four string 
)
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hive.hcatalog.data.JsonSerDe'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/json/';

SELECT * FROM test_json;

DESCRIBE FORMATTED test_json;

-- AVRO

-- https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/master/examples/src/main/resources/user.avsc
-- https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/master/examples/src/main/resources/users.avro

DROP TABLE users;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE users
STORED AS AVRO
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/avro/users/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('avro.schema.url'='/user/instructor/data/avro/schema/user.avsc');

SELECT count(*) FROM users;
select * from users;

-- PARQUET
DROP TABLE flightdelays_parquet_snappy;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays_parquet_snappy(
    dep_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT
)
STORED AS PARQUET
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightsdelays_parquet_snappy/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY');

DROP TABLE flightdelays_parquet_gzip;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays_parquet_gzip(
    dep_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT
)
STORED AS PARQUET
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightsdelays_parquet_gzip/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('parquet.compression'='GZIP');

DROP TABLE flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed(
    dep_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT
)
STORED AS PARQUET
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightsdelays_parquet_uncompressed/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('parquet.compression'='UNCOMPRESSED');

CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightsdelays_csv    
    (dep_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT
)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightsdelays_csv/';

DESCRIBE FORMATTED flightdelays_parquet_snappy;
DESCRIBE FORMATTED flightdelays_parquet_gzip;
DESCRIBE FORMATTED flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed;

SELECT count(*) FROM flightdelays;
SELECT count(*) FROM flightdelays_parquet_snappy;

INSERT INTO flightdelays_parquet_snappy
SELECT
    `dep_time`, 
    `unique_carrier`, 
    `flight_num`, 
    `arr_delay`, 
    `origin`, 
    `dest`,
    `year`,
    `month`,
    `day`
FROM 
    flightdelays;

SELECT count(*) FROM flightdelays_parquet_snappy;

INSERT INTO flightdelays_parquet_gzip
SELECT
    `dep_time`, 
    `unique_carrier`, 
    `flight_num`, 
    `arr_delay`, 
    `origin`, 
    `dest`,
    `year`,
    `month`,
    `day`
FROM 
    flightdelays;


SELECT count(*) FROM flightdelays_parquet_gzip;


INSERT INTO flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed
SELECT
    `dep_time`, 
    `unique_carrier`, 
    `flight_num`, 
    `arr_delay`, 
    `origin`, 
    `dest`,
    `year`,
    `month`,
    `day`
FROM 
    flightdelays;


SELECT count(*) FROM flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed;


INSERT INTO flightsdelays_csv
SELECT
    `dep_time`, 
    `unique_carrier`, 
    `flight_num`, 
    `arr_delay`, 
    `origin`, 
    `dest`,
    `year`,
    `month`,
    `day`
FROM 
    flightdelays;


SELECT count(*) FROM flightsdelays_csv;

SELECT * FROM flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed;
-- 1.20s
SELECT * FROM flightdelays_parquet_gzip;
-- 3s
SELECT * FROM flightdelays_parquet_snappy;
-- 2.36

SELECT dest, AVG(dep_time) FROM flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed GROUP BY dest;
-- 2s
SELECT dest, AVG(dep_time) FROM flightdelays_parquet_gzip GROUP BY dest;
-- 3s
SELECT dest, AVG(dep_time) FROM flightdelays_parquet_snappy GROUP BY dest;
-- 2.36

-- avro vs parquet
DROP TABLE ventas_parquet;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ventas_parquet(
    id_cliente INT,
    id_sucursal INT,
    id_producto INT,
    precio FLOAT,
    cantidad INT,
    fecha_dia INT,
    fecha_mes INT,
    fecha_anio INT
)
STORED AS PARQUET
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/parquet_avro/ventas_parquet/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('parquet.schema.url'='/user/instructor/data/parquet_avro/schema/venta.avsc');

DROP TABLE ventas_avro;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE ventas_avro(
    id_cliente INT,
    id_sucursal INT,
    id_producto INT,
    precio FLOAT,
    cantidad INT,
    fecha_dia INT,
    fecha_mes INT,
    fecha_anio INT
)
STORED AS AVRO
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/parquet_avro/ventas_avro/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('parquet.schema.url'='/user/instructor/data/parquet_avro/schema/venta.avsc');

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ventas_parquet;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ventas_avro;

DROP TABLE data_csv;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE data_csv(
    id_cliente INT,
    id_sucursal INT,
    id_producto INT,
    precio FLOAT,
    cantidad INT,
    fecha_dia INT,
    fecha_mes INT,
    fecha_anio INT
)
ROW FORMAT DELIMITED
FIELDS TERMINATED BY ','
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/parquet_avro/ventas/';

select * from data_csv LIMIT 5;

INSERT INTO data_csv (id_cliente,
    id_sucursal,
    id_producto,
    precio,
    cantidad,
    fecha_dia,
    fecha_mes,
    fecha_anio)
SELECT id_cliente,
    id_sucursal,
    id_producto,
    precio,
    cantidad,
    fecha_dia,
    fecha_mes,
    fecha_anio
FROM data_csv;

-- 7 ejecuciones para llegar a 2 millones de registros
select count(*) from data_csv;

INSERT INTO ventas_parquet (id_cliente,
    id_sucursal,
    id_producto,
    precio,
    cantidad,
    fecha_dia,
    fecha_mes,
    fecha_anio)
SELECT id_cliente,
    id_sucursal,
    id_producto,
    precio,
    cantidad,
    fecha_dia,
    fecha_mes,
    fecha_anio
FROM data_csv;
-- 8.99s

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ventas_parquet;
-- 5.59s

INSERT INTO ventas_avro (id_cliente,
    id_sucursal,
    id_producto,
    precio,
    cantidad,
    fecha_dia,
    fecha_mes,
    fecha_anio)
SELECT id_cliente,
    id_sucursal,
    id_producto,
    precio,
    cantidad,
    fecha_dia,
    fecha_mes,
    fecha_anio
FROM data_csv;
-- 10.15s

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ventas_avro;
-- 10.74s

SELECT * FROM data_csv;
-- 1.2
SELECT * FROM ventas_avro;
-- 1.5s
SELECT * FROM ventas_parquet;
-- 3s

SELECT id_producto, precio, cantidad FROM data_csv;
--2s
SELECT id_producto, precio, cantidad FROM ventas_avro;
--3s
SELECT id_producto, precio, cantidad FROM ventas_parquet;
--2s
SELECT fecha_anio, AVG(precio * cantidad) FROM data_csv GROUP BY fecha_anio;
--5
SELECT fecha_anio, AVG(precio * cantidad) FROM ventas_avro GROUP BY fecha_anio;
--10s
SELECT fecha_anio, AVG(precio * cantidad) FROM ventas_parquet GROUP BY fecha_anio;
--2.5s

SELECT fecha_anio, MAX(precio) FROM data_csv GROUP BY fecha_anio;
--5
SELECT fecha_anio, MAX(precio) FROM ventas_avro GROUP BY fecha_anio;
--9s
SELECT fecha_anio, MAX(precio) FROM ventas_parquet GROUP BY fecha_anio;
--2.5s", "lastExecutedStatements": "SELECT count(*) FROM flightsdelays_csv;", "aceErrorsHolder": [], "showOptimizer": false, "currentQueryTab": "queryResults", "lastCheckStatusRequest": {"status": 200, "statusText": "OK", "readyState": 4, "responseJSON": {"status": 0, "query_status": {"status": "available", "has_result_set": true}}, "responseText": "{"status": 0, "query_status": {"status": "available", "has_result_set": true}}"}, "jobs": [], "statementType": "text", "variableValues": {}, "executeNextTimeout": -1, "queriesTotalPages": 1, "formatEnabled": true, "properties": {"files": [], "functions": [], "arguments": [], "settings": []}, "aceErrors": [], "isCanceling": false, "externalStatementLoaded": false, "chartScatterSize": null, "chartYSingle": null, "suggestion": "", "statementPath": "", "showExecutionAnalysis": true, "chartX": null, "autocompleteSettings": {"temporaryOnly": false}, "variables": [], "showChart": false, "isResultSettingsVisible": true, "showGrid": true, "pinnedContextTabs": [], "viewSettings": {"sqlDialect": true, "placeHolder": "Ejemplo: SELECT * FROM nombre de tabla o pulse CTRL + espacio"}, "statementsList": ["-- JSON

-- JSON
-- https://github.com/rcongiu/Hive-JSON-Serde
DROP TABLE test_json;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE test_json (
    one boolean,
    three array<string>,
    two double,
    four string 
)
ROW FORMAT SERDE 'org.apache.hive.hcatalog.data.JsonSerDe'
STORED AS TEXTFILE
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/json/';

SELECT * FROM test_json;

DESCRIBE FORMATTED test_json;

-- AVRO

-- https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/master/examples/src/main/resources/user.avsc
-- https://github.com/apache/spark/blob/master/examples/src/main/resources/users.avro

DROP TABLE users;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE users
STORED AS AVRO
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/avro/users/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('avro.schema.url'='/user/instructor/data/avro/schema/user.avsc');

SELECT count(*) FROM users;
select * from users;

-- PARQUET
DROP TABLE flightdelays_parquet_snappy;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays_parquet_snappy(
    dep_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT
)
STORED AS PARQUET
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightsdelays_parquet_snappy/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('parquet.compression'='SNAPPY');

DROP TABLE flightdelays_parquet_gzip;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays_parquet_gzip(
    dep_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT
)
STORED AS PARQUET
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightsdelays_parquet_gzip/'
TBLPROPERTIES ('parquet.compression'='GZIP');

DROP TABLE flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed;
CREATE EXTERNAL TABLE flightdelays_parquet_uncompressed(
    dep_time INT,
    unique_carrier STRING,
    flight_num INT,
    arr_delay INT,
    origin STRING,
    dest STRING,
    year INT,
    month INT,
    day INT
)
STORED AS PARQUET
LOCATION '/user/instructor/data/flights/flightsdelays_parquet_uncompre
